CustomField.formula:
IF( (OR(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_1__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_City__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_State__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Postal_Code__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Country__c)))),
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_1__c )), ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_1__c & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_2__c )), " ", ""), "") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_2__c )), ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_2__c , "") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_3__c )), BR() & ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_3__c , "") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_4__c )), BR() & ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_4__c , "") &
IF(OR(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_1__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_2__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_3__c )), NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Line_4__c ))), BR(), "") &
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_City__c)), ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_City__c & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_State__c)), ", " , IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Postal_Code__c)), " " , BR())) , "") &
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_State__c)), ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_State__c & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Postal_Code__c)), " " , BR()) , "") & IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Postal_Code__c)), ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Postal_Code__c & BR() ,"") &
IF(NOT(ISBLANK(ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Country__c)), ucinn_ascendv2__Preferred_Address_Country__c , "") , "" )
CustomField.label: Preferred Address
